movement_control module¶

movement_control.callback(data)¶
movement_control.main()¶

Main code for movement control

Receives some geometry_msgs.Point coordinates and takes a time to arrive to the destination. Sends back a signal to inform the arrival.

subscribe: /move_coords (geometry_msgs.Point) publish: /arrived (std_msgs.Bool)
